subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which city is the capital of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के राजधानी किस शहर है?
explanation_en: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan.
explanation_ar: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which fort is known as the 'Golden Fort'?
question_hi: क्या फ़ोट 'गोल्डन फोट' के नाम किसके उपयोग करने वाला है।
explanation_en: Amber Fort is known as the 'Golden Fort'. It is situated in Jaipur and was built by Raja Man Singh I in 1592 CE.
explanation_hi: अमर्ह फोट 'गोल्ड फोट' का अन्तर्षिता है। जयपुर में स्थल बना उसका बनाई करीता है। इसका शिखिता कर्षमंड़ में राजा मन सिंग I ने 1592 CE में बना।
explanation_ar: قلعة أمبر(Amber Fort) هو مَعلم تاريخي يقع في مدينة جايبور(Jaipur) وتم بناؤه من قِبَل راجا مان سينغ الأول(Raja Man Singh I) في عام 1592 CE.
question_ar: قلعة أَمْبَر(Amber Fort) مَعلم تاريخيٌّ موجود في مدينة جَايپور(Jaipur)، وتم بناؤها مِن قِبَل راجا مان سينغ الأول(Raja Man Singh I) في عام 1592 CE.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Rajput king belonged to the Jaipur Royal Family?
question_hi: जेपुर के लाल संत किस्मान के किस्मान को Jaipur के लाल संत के बांवर्षिता है।
explanation_en: Prince Sawai Mansingh I was the member of the Jaipur Royal Family and belonged to the Jaipur Royal Family.
explanation_hi: शाहीदा मांसिंग I एक जेपूर संत के एसाइंग II एसाइंग ई एसाइंग ई
explanation_ar: Prince Sawai Mansingh I was a member of the Jaipur Royal Family and belonged to the Jaipur Royal Family.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the significance of Camel Festival in Rajasthan culture?
explanation_en: The Camel Festival is a significant event in Rajasthan culture, representing the heritage and traditions of Jaipur.
explanation_ar: مهرجان الجمل هو حدث مهم في ثقافة راجستان، تمثيلًا للتراث والعادات من جايبور.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the oldest city in Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Jaisalmer is the oldest city in Rajasthan and it is known for its rich history and traditions.
explanation_ar: Jaisalmer is the oldest city in Rajasthan and it is known for its rich history and traditions.
